response: twitter has taken some steps to protect your personal information and ensure data privacy. they have made changes to their policies, and now you can easily control what information is visible to others on the platform. you have the choice of sharing your location with people who follow you or not. the company has also added two-factor authentication for added security. however, it's essential to note that twitter still collects some personal data from users such as their phone number and email address.<|endoftext|>
